casebody.data:
Steven K. STANLEY
v.
STATE'S ATTORNEY Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 11, 2018

Steven K. Stanley, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Matthew A. Weiner, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 901, 175 A.3d 85 (2018), is denied.
